CustomField.formula: IF(ST_Baltimore_Gas_Electric__c > 0, 'Baltimore Gas & Electric ', '') + IF(ST_Bauer_Foundation__c > 0, 'Bauer Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_CareFirst__c > 0, 'CareFirst ', '') + IF(ST_Charles_Crane_Foundation__c > 0, 'Charles Crane Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_COPS__c > 0, 'COPS ', '') + IF(ST_CRSF__c > 0, 'CRSF ', '') + IF(ST_Fund_II__c > 0, 'Fund II ', '') + IF(ST_GEICO__c > 0, 'GEICO ', '') + IF(ST_Healthy_Lifestyles_HL__c > 0, 'Healthy Lifestyles (HL) ', '') + IF(ST_Herb_Block_Foundation__c > 0, 'Herb Block Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_JeepChrysler__c > 0, 'JeepChrysler ', '') + IF(ST_Marriott_Foundation__c > 0, 'Marriott Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_Mississippi_Dept_of_Human_Services__c > 0, 'Mississippi Dept. of Human Services ', '') + IF(ST_Naples_Children_Education__c > 0, 'Naples Children & Education Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_Niagara_Cares__c > 0, 'Niagara Cares ', '') + IF(ST_Niagara_Cares_Hurricane_Relief__c > 0, 'Niagara Cares Hurricane Relief Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_North_Carolina_Department_of_Justice__c > 0, 'North Carolina Department of Justice ', '')+ IF(ST_Office_of_Juvenile_Justice__c > 0, 'Office of Juvenile Justice & Delinquency Prevention ', '') + IF(ST_Ohio_Office_of_the_Attorney_General__c > 0, 'Ohio Office of the Attorney General ', '') + IF(ST_Perdue_Henson_Foundation__c > 0, 'Perdue & Henson Foundation ', '') + IF(ST_Prince_William_HIDTA__c > 0, 'Prince William HIDTA ', '') + IF(ST_Private_Grants__c > 0, 'Private Grants ', '') + IF(ST_Roanoke_HIDTA__c > 0, 'Roanoke HIDTA ', '') + IF(ST_SUEZ__c > 0, 'SUEZ ', '') + IF(ST_Sun_Trust_Bank__c > 0, 'Sun Trust Bank ', '') + IF(ST_TransAmerica__c > 0, 'TransAmerica ', '') + IF(ST_Under_Armour__c > 0, 'Under Armour ', '') + IF(ST_United_Health_Care__c > 0, 'United Health Care ', '') + IF(ST_US_Department_of_State__c > 0, 'US Department of State ', '') + IF(ST_Washington_Baltimore_HIDTA__c > 0, 'Washington/Baltimore HIDTA ', '') + IF(ST_Wisconsin_Department_of_Justice__c > 0, 'Wisconsin Department of Justice ', '') + IF(ST_YDP_Growth_Fund__c > 0, 'YDP Growth Fund ', '') + IF(ST_Viragh_Family_Foundation__c > 0, 'Viragh Family Bauer Charitable Fdn ', '') + IF(ST_Sherman_Fairchild_Fdn__c > 0, 'Sherman Fairchild Fdn ', '') + IF(ST_Toledo_Community_Fdn__c > 0, 'Toledo Community Fdn ', '') + IF(ST_PNC__c > 0, 'PNC ', '') + IF(ST_Blue_Cross_Blue_Shield__c > 0, 'Blue Cross Blue Shield ', '')
